examples.translation: 我们能够相信他说的是实情吗?
examples.first: Can we accept his account as the true
This dictionary is available in electronic

examples.translation: 这首歌曲改编为爵士乐後采用了切分音节奏.
examples.first: The song has a syncopated rhythm in the jazz

n: an interpretation of a matter from a particular viewpoint
something a little different from others of the same type
a written work (as a novel) that has been recast in a new form
